FuncDef: The display multicast-list command displays information about the specified multicast list, or all the multicast lists.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the multicast list to be viewed.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Displays information about the specified multicast list, or all the multicast lists.
If the parameter list-name is not specified, information about all the multicast lists is displayed.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
